title: New: Silent Devices – Marchlands
content:
After a period of relative silence following the release of their double-A single Una/Moire last year, Leicester-based ambient rockers Silent Devices return with ‘Marchlands’. Another individual release, it’s a track which seamlessly weaves together singer Josh Coyne’s beautifully understated vocals with the instantly recognisable guitar twang that so often stands out – but never dominates – on their songs.

The release of ‘Marchlands’ fits in with the band’s tendency to produce truly gorgeous music at a tragically sparse rate. There’s potential for a truly great album here somewhere – it’s just a matter of time.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d16
